noConstructorReturn.description:
Description

Disallow returning a value from aconstructor.
Returning a value from aconstructorof a class is a possible error.
Forbidding this pattern prevents errors resulting from unfamiliarity with JavaScript or a copy-paste error.
Only returning without a value is allowed, as itâ€™s a control flow statement.
noConstructorReturn.option: This rule has no specific options.
